visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Scatter plot comparing actual and predicted food grain production values

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram showing distribution of prediction residuals

visualizations.title: Production Over Time
visualizations.description: Time series plot of actual vs predicted production values

insights: - Residuals show normal distribution with slight positive bias
data.summary: The Naive Forecast model demonstrated exceptional performance with R²=0.9951 and MAPE=7.74%. Visualizations confirm strong alignment between actual and predicted values, with residuals showing random distribution around zero. The time series plot reveals consistent prediction accuracy across all time periods.
data.task_answer: The Naive Forecast model successfully predicted food grain production with high accuracy (R²=0.9951, MAPE=7.74%). Predictions closely follow actual values with minimal systematic error, making it suitable for forecasting 2024-25 production values.
